data.title: City of Lompoc
data.meta_description:
City of Lompoc | 621 followers on LinkedIn. Welcome to the City of Lompoc's LinkedIn page. | Welcome to the City of Lompoc's official LinkedIn page.

Learn more about city programs and services at www.cityoflompoc.com.
data.text:
Please join us in celebrating one of our valued collection sites - City of Lompoc! This incredible location in Santa Barbara County provides needed resources to the community as a Bye Bye Mattress drop-off location. To learn more about this and other sites, visit https://lnkd.in/g-F2n5Ey. #MRC #MattressRecycling #California

Today we are throwing it back to the ribbon cutting on July 2 celebrating our new Pioneer Park playground and fitness area. Come enjoy these Lompoc Parks & Recreation amenities! This project was made possible through funding secured by Congressman Salud Carbajal. This video was produced by our own Lompoc Media Center - TAP TV and KPEG. #TBT #ParkandRecMonth #whereyoubelong

Are you interested in making a difference by serving your community in local government? The nomination period is underway for Lompoc City Council seats. Learn more: https://lnkd.in/dUzXCRsB.

Our Lompoc Parks and Rec facilities are #WhereYouBelong. Refer to the full month of activities on the calendar linked from the City of Lompoc Parks and Recreation web page: https://lnkd.in/gThdXagT. #ParkandRecMonth

What do you want for the future of Lompoc transit? Take the survey and share your ideas, opinions and priorities. You will be entered for a chance to win a $50 Visa gift card. https://lnkd.in/gGjQttYJ
